text: The 2001 Miller Lite Hall of Fame Championships was a men's tennis tournament played on grass courts at the International Tennis Hall of Fame in Newport, Rhode Island in the United States and was part of the International Series of the 2001 ATP Tour. It was the 26th edition of the tournament and ran from July 9 through July 15, 2001. ==Winners== ===Men's Singles=== Neville Godwin defeated Martin Lee 6–1, 6–4 * It was Godwin's only title of the year and the 1st of his career. ===Men's Doubles=== Bob Bryan / Mike Bryan defeated André Sá / Glenn Weiner 6–3, 7–5 * It was Bob Bryan's 3rd title of the year and the 3rd of his career. It was Mike Bryan's 3rd title of the year and the 3rd of his career. ==External links== * Official Website * ATP Tournament Profile * ITF – Newport Tournament Details Miller Lite Hall of Fame Championships Category:Hall of Fame Open Miller Lite Hall of Fame Championships Category:Tennis in Rhode Island
title: 2001 Miller Lite Hall of Fame Championships
